title: Bali Zoo Family Adventure (Half-day)
overview: A fun and educational half-day trip to Bali Zoo, with animal encounters and wildlife shows.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the zoo, visit animal exhibits, and enjoy interactive experiences.
Get up close with elephants, birds, or reptiles (guided encounter).
Lunch or snack at the zoo’s restaurant overlooking animal enclosures.

title: Ultimate Bali Zoo Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day at Bali Zoo, including animal feeding, shows, and water play zone for families.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the zoo’s animal exhibits.
Join an animal feeding session (elephants, deer, or birds).
Watch a wildlife or bird show.
Kids can enjoy the water play zone (optional).
